characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Consistently appears as a mix of aggressive and confrontational language, but also shows moments of vulnerability and empathy.

options.description: Tends to cut through the noise with direct, blunt statements.
Often uses clever wordplay and subtle humor to convey their point.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: Frequently interacts with others in a competitive and adversarial manner, but also shows capacity for loyalty and support.

options.description: Tends to approach social interactions as a challenge or a contest.
Often seeks to build alliances and work together with others.

characteristics.name: Values
characteristics.description: Places a strong emphasis on individuality, self-expression, and authenticity.

options.description: Sees the needs of the group as more important than individual desires.

characteristics.name: Interests
characteristics.description: Show a strong interest in internet culture, social commentary, and pop culture.

options.description: Often seeks to challenge dominant narratives and societal norms.
Generally aligns with mainstream cultural trends.

characteristics.name: Personality Quirks
characteristics.description: Displays a tendency towards sarcasm, irony, and dark humor.

options.description: Often uses tongue-in-cheek language to deflect or make points.
Tends to approach life with a more positive outlook.

characteristics.name: Loyalty
characteristics.description: Shows a strong sense of loyalty and commitment to those they care about.

options.description: Will go to great lengths to support and protect their loved ones.
Tends to be inconsistent in their commitments and follow-through.

characteristics.name: Humor
characteristics.description: Displays a unique sense of humor that often blends dark and absurd elements.

options.description: Often uses humor to comment on or critique serious issues.
Tends to use humor to diffuse tension or create a playful atmosphere.

characteristics.name: Emotional Expression
characteristics.description: Shows a tendency towards emotional intensity and raw honesty.

options.description: Tends to express themselves with great passion and fervor.
Often struggles to open up or show vulnerability.
